Content: Leverage: This is the final act and focuses on a small alien empire
destabilizing the lunar empire leading to a final assault on the
capital of the Echelon-republic (the moon Echelon) and its destruction,
therby cementing xenophobia in the human empire and restoring earth as
the capital of the empire of humankind. This act should teach the
player how to win as a underdog with clever, diplomacy, intelligence
